---
category: news
title: "1923 earthquake exhibit canceled after outcry over AI ‘testimonies’"
excerpt: "The Japanese Red Cross Society’s Tokyo chapter has canceled an exhibition on the 1923 Great Kanto Earthquake that featured survivors’ “testimonies” created using generative artificial intelligence, which were criticized as being misleading."
